page.title: 16HOME LIFE
page.content: {The Bedroom}is used mainly for sleeping and dressing, although a child's bedroom may also be used as a playing room,or a place to do school homework.Children may sometimes share a bedroom. Furnishings would include a bed,usually with a sprung mattress.It may be covered with a feather duvet,or sheets and blankets.There may be a wardrobe and a chest of drawers for storing clothes.Also a small bedside table,with an electric lamp,and perhaps an electric radio / alarm clock.In some bedrooms,you might also find a bookcase,and perhaps a toy box. The floor is normally carpeted,and there will be curtains at the windows. The room may be heated by gas,electric or oil heaters,used only in the winter months.
